players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we work together to uncover any suspicious behavior or patterns."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie. Let's all share any information we have and keep an eye on each other to ensure the safety of our group."

Charlie: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is the mafia. I urge everyone to be vigilant and share any suspicious behavior or patterns they notice. Let's work together to identify and eliminate the threat."
You: "I will remain silent and observe everyone's behavior. If I notice anything suspicious, I'll share it with the group."
